name: Gardens Inc. 2: The Road to Fame
description: Jill & Mike have established their gardening company in Sunnyvale and now they are ready for the next step. Help them to win a contest that will be followed by contracts all over the world!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista / XP / 7 Processor: 1.0 GHz Pentium 4 or equivalent Graphics: 256 MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space

reviews.review_text: A fun time-managemnent game--similar to Ranch Rush or Farm Frenzy but slightly more involved. Very enjoyable casual gameplay. I only wish it was longer.
